attributes.action: Increase NHS workforce by clearing student debt for all NHS staff. #helpithurts
attributes.additional_details:
#drained,strained,pained,withnogain
Rising costs, low wages, long shifts, frontline work…
attributes.background: Encourage NHS staff to stay working in a difficult environment, encourage graduates to retrain in the NHS, encourage those currently training to join a difficult environment, encourage previous NHS workers to rejoin the workforce, reduce the burden.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to increase the number of people who work for the NHS, and to allow any student debt accrued by NHS staff to be scrubbed, but it is not clear from the main text of the petition, what specific actions you would like the Government or Parliament to take to encourage recruitment take up. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We currently have the below petitions open regarding student nurse fees and bursaries, which you might like to sign:

Fund free tuition and full maintenance bursaries for all student nurses
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593826

Require student nurses/midwives be paid the same as a HCA whilst on placement#
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593957
